sense.gloss: not writing or contacting for a while, neglecting (failing) to write (call, visit, etc.), long silence
weeding out, elimination (e.g. of unneeded employees), culling, selection
notice, information, communication, news, message, tidings, update
talk (of the town), rumour, rumor, gossip
news (from someone), word, letter, tidings, contact
matter for the court, (ending up as a) lawsuit, legal tussle, court fight

sdata.j: できるというならそれを↑表沙汰↑↓おもてざた↓にするがよい。
sdata.e: I defy you to make it public.

sdata.j: ご↑無沙汰↑↓ぶさた↓をして、ごめんなさい。
sdata.e: I am sorry I did not write to you for such a long time.

sdata.j: ご↑無沙汰↑↓ぶさた↓はお↑互↑↓たが↓いさまです。
sdata.e: I am as much in the wrong as you are about not writing before this.

sdata.j: ご↑無沙汰↑↓ぶさた↓しています。
sdata.e: It has been a long time since I wrote you last.

sdata.j: あんまりご↑無沙汰↑↓ぶさた↓してしまって、どうも↑敷居↑↓しきい↓が↑高↑↓たか↓くなってしまいました。
sdata.e: I have neglected you so long that I feel a bit shy in visiting you.

sdata.j: ２↑年間↑↓ねんかん↓のご↑無沙汰↑↓ぶさた↓でした。
sdata.e: Two years have passed since I last met you.

sdata.j: ↑食糧↑↓しょくりょう↓↑不足↑↓ふそく↓のため↑市↑↓し↓の↑至↑↓いた↓る↑所↑↓ところ↓で↑暴力↑↓ぼうりょく↓↑沙汰↑↓ざた↓が↑突発↑↓とっぱつ↓した。
sdata.e: Violence erupted all over the city because of the food shortages.

sdata.j: ↑地獄↑↓じごく↓の↑沙汰↑↓さた↓も↑金↑↓かね↓↑次第↑↓しだい↓。
↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓にあの↑山↑↓やま↓に↑登↑↓のぼ↓るのは↑狂気↑↓きょうき↓の↑沙汰↑↓さた↓だ。
sdata.e: It would be madness to climb that mountain in winter.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がしたことは↑狂気↑↓きょうき↓の↑沙汰↑↓さた↓としか↑言↑↓い↓いようがなかった。
sdata.e: What he did was nothing less than madness.

words.gloss: not writing or contacting for a while, neglecting (failing) to write (call, visit, etc.), long silence
weeding out, elimination (e.g. of unneeded employees), culling, selection
